text: Joel Riddez (born 21 May 1980) is a Swedish football coach and former former professional player. He was in charge of Swedish Damallsvenskan club Djurgårdens IF. Riddez previously played for Swedish sides Djurgården, Assyriska, and Örebro, as well as Norwegian side Strømsgodset IF. ==References== ==External links== * (profile 1) * (profile 2) Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Swedish footballers Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll players Category:Örebro SK players Category:Assyriska FF players Category:Strømsgodset Toppfotball players Category:Swedish football managers Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll (women) managers Category:Swedish expatriate footballers Category:Swedish expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway
title: Joel Riddez
